definitions: the action of writing one's signature on an official document

examples.text: he plans to oversee the signing of modest agreements on energy, education, and the environment

shortDefinitions: action of writing one's signature on official document

definitions: the action of recruiting someone, especially to a professional sports team or record company
a person who has recently been recruited, especially to join a professional sports team or record company
shortDefinitions: person who has recently been recruited

definitions: an event in a bookstore or other place at which an author signs a number of books to gain publicity and sales

examples.text: Jeffrey Archer was doing a book signing

shortDefinitions: event in bookshop or other place at which author signs several books to gain publicity and sales

examples.text: most special schools use some form of signing

definitions: the provision of signs in a street or other place

examples.text: emergency signing will guide diverted traffic
the shop's layout and shelf signing are excellent

shortDefinitions: provision of signs in street or other place
